pr_title: bootnodes as empty string does not work, needs to be a list

timeline.message:
bootnodes as empty string does not work, needs to be a list

Signed-off-by: Sally MacFarlane <sally.macfarlane@consensys.net>
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into run-bootnodes-empty-list

timeline.bodyText:
Probably should just be

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            #bootnodes = ""
          
          
            
            bootnodes = []
timeline.author: ajsutton
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,7 +9,7 @@ port = 9000
 # "static" - no discovery, only connect to static peers
 # "discv5" - Enable discovery v5
 discovery = "static"
-bootnodes = ""
+#bootnodes = ""

replies.bodyText: I tried that, it didn't work :/
replies.author: macfarla

replies.bodyText: hmm, it did for Cem and I.  I just use a custom config file so forgot to update the checked in version.
replies.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText: it really should be defaulted in ArtemisConfiguration so that removal doesn't tank everyones instances...
replies.author: rolfyone
